title: Clannad
summary: A high school delinquent gets involved with a group of girls, each with their own struggles, leading him to personal growth and emotional connections.

title: March Comes in Like a Lion
summary: A young professional Shogi player, struggling with personal demons, forms an unlikely bond with three sisters, finding comfort and growth in their companionship.

title: Barakamon
summary: A calligrapher moves to a remote village to rediscover his creative spirit, forming new friendships and learning life lessons along the way.

title: Your Lie in April
summary: A talented young pianist who has lost his ability to hear music is reinspired by a spirited violinist, leading to emotional growth and personal healing.

title: Anohana: The Flower We Saw That Day
summary: A group of childhood friends reunites to deal with the lingering guilt and unresolved feelings caused by the death of one of their own.

title: Toradora!
summary: A high school student forms an unlikely friendship with two classmates, leading to complicated relationships and emotional growth.

title: Honey and Clover
summary: A group of college students navigates the challenges of relationships, personal ambitions, and growing up, dealing with the ups and downs of life and love.

title: Little Busters!
summary: A group of friends forms a club that participates in various activities, learning about life, love, and the struggles they each face in a slice-of-life setting.

title: March Comes in Like a Lion 2nd Season
summary: The continuation of Rei Kiriyama's journey, exploring deeper themes of loneliness, healing, and the power of human connection through his relationships.

title: The Pet Girl of Sakurasou
summary: A group of eccentric students living in a dormitory struggles with their own dreams, insecurities, and relationships while trying to move forward in life.
